targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM ssh_connections
WHERE CASE
        WHEN '${lookup_ip}' = '' THEN FALSE
        ELSE client_ip = '${lookup_ip}'::inet
      END;
select client_ip,connections,last_seen,country_code from ssh_connections order by last_seen desc limit 5
select client_ip,active_connections,last_seen,country_code from ssh_connections where active_connections > 0 ORDER by last_seen desc limit 5
select sum(connections) as connections, country_code from ssh_connections GROUP BY country_code order by connections desc
select sum(total_time_wasted) as wasted, country_code from ssh_connections GROUP BY country_code order by wasted desc

SELECT 
    COUNT(icv.client_ip) AS ip_count,
    version
FROM 
    client_versions cv
INNER JOIN 
    ip_client_versions icv ON cv.id = icv.version_id
GROUP BY 
    cv.id
ORDER BY 
    ip_count desc
LIMIT 10;
SELECT client_ip, max_concurrent, last_seen, total_time_wasted, country_code from ssh_connections order by max_concurrent desc limit 10
select count(client_ip) as ips, asn from ssh_connections GROUP BY asn order by ips desc limit 10;

SELECT 
    latitude AS "latitude",
    longitude AS "longitude",
    client_ip AS "name",
    last_seen AS "time",
    connections AS "connections",
    total_time_wasted AS "total_time_wasted",
    active_connections AS "active_connections"
FROM ssh_connections
WHERE latitude IS NOT NULL AND longitude IS NOT NULL and active_connections > 0

SELECT
  latitude AS "latitude",
  longitude AS "longitude",
  client_ip AS "name",
  last_seen AS "time",
  total_time_wasted
FROM ssh_connections
WHERE latitude IS NOT NULL AND longitude IS NOT NULL
  AND total_time_wasted IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY total_time_wasted;
